D

DesignGridLayout - Class in net.java.dev.designgridlayout
Swing LayoutManager that implements "Canonical Grids" as used by graphic artists to design magazines, posters, forms...
DesignGridLayout(Container) - Constructor for class net.java.dev.designgridlayout.DesignGridLayout
Builds a DesignGridLayout instance attached to a Container.
disableSmartVerticalResize() - Method in class net.java.dev.designgridlayout.DesignGridLayout
Disable DesignGridLayout "smart vertical resize" feature.

F

forceConsistentBaselinesDistance() - Method in class net.java.dev.designgridlayout.DesignGridLayout
Requires to use consistent baselines spacing of all pairs of two consecutive rows which first row has a fixed height.

I

IGridRow - Interface in net.java.dev.designgridlayout
Any row created by DesignGridLayout.row().grid() implements this interface.
INonGridRow - Interface in net.java.dev.designgridlayout
Any row created by one of DesignGridLayout.row().left(), DesignGridLayout.row().center() or DesignGridLayout.row().right() implements this interface.
IRow - Interface in net.java.dev.designgridlayout
Any row created by DesignGridLayout implements this minimal interface.
IRowCreator - Interface in net.java.dev.designgridlayout
Interface returned by row() in order to specify the type of row to be actually added to the current layout (grid, centered, left- or right-aligned).
ISpannableGridRow - Interface in net.java.dev.designgridlayout
Rows created by DesignGridLayout.row().grid() and DesignGridLayout.row().grid(JLabel) implement this interface.
ISubGridStarter - Interface in net.java.dev.designgridlayout
This interface is used to start a new canonical grid row (when called from row()), or to start a new canonical sub-grid in the current grid row (when called from IGridRow).

L

labelAlignment(LabelAlignment) - Method in class net.java.dev.designgridlayout.DesignGridLayout
Define the alignment to use for labels in DesignGridLayout grids.
LabelAlignment - Enum in net.java.dev.designgridlayout
Defines how components located in a sub-grid label column can be aligned inside this column.
left() - Method in interface net.java.dev.designgridlayout.IRowCreator
Creates a left-aligned row.

N

net.java.dev.designgridlayout - package net.java.dev.designgridlayout
DesignGridLayout is a revolutionary LayoutManager for Swing applications, based on "canonical grids", well-known in publishing.

S

spanRow() - Method in interface net.java.dev.designgridlayout.ISpannableGridRow
Specifies that the next grid column will be filled with the same component in the same column location in the row above this row.

W

withoutConsistentWidthAcrossNonGridRows() - Method in class net.java.dev.designgridlayout.DesignGridLayout
Disable DesignGridLayout feature that ensures all components located in non-grid rows all have consistent width.
withOwnRowWidth() - Method in interface net.java.dev.designgridlayout.INonGridRow
